channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Secret Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Secret Server

item.title: CVE-2020-4842|2024-09-16T20:58:59.228Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.6 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 190046.

item.title: CVE-2020-4342|2024-09-16T18:54:31.455Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 could disclose sensitive information included in installation files to an unauthorized user. IBM X-Force ID: 178182.

item.title: CVE-2020-4322|2024-09-16T20:16:44.204Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 could allow a remote attacker to hijack the clicking action of the victim. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to hijack the victim's click actions and possibly launch further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 177511.

item.title: CVE-2021-20569|2024-09-16T20:48:07.733Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server up to 11.0 could allow an attacker to enumerate usernames due to improper input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 199243.

item.title: CVE-2020-4341|2024-09-16T20:21:35.775Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 178181.

item.title: CVE-2020-4324|2024-09-16T17:53:54.345Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server proir to 10.9 could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 177515.

item.title: CVE-2019-4632|2024-09-16T16:22:57.810Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 170004.

item.title: CVE-2019-4631|2024-09-16T19:35:34.651Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 170001.

item.title: CVE-2020-4840|2024-09-16T16:19:00.510Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.6 could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 190044.

item.title: CVE-2020-4843|2024-09-16T17:58:51.309Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.6 stores potentially sensitive information in config files that could be read by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 190048.

item.title: CVE-2019-4636|2024-09-16T19:05:35.447Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 could disclose sensitive information to an authenticated user from generated error messages. IBM X-Force ID: 170013.

item.title: CVE-2019-4639|2024-09-16T17:23:49.508Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 170045.

item.title: CVE-2020-4459|2024-09-16T20:31:56.852Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.7 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 181395.

item.title: CVE-2019-4635|2024-09-16T19:25:26.508Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 could allow a privileged user to perform unauthorized command injection due to imporoper input neutralization of special elements. IBM X-Force ID: 170011.

item.title: CVE-2020-4327|2024-09-16T18:29:46.621Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 177599.

item.title: CVE-2019-4633|2024-09-16T20:01:26.507Z -- ibm -- security%20secret%20server
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server 10.7 could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information due to an overly permissive CORS policy. IBM X-Force ID: 170007.
